insert.foreach: insert into MED_REQUIRE_RELA( group_id, hos_id, copy_code, total_id, req_id, inv_id , req_amount , exec_amount )values( #{item.group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.total_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.req_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.inv_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.req_amount,jdbcType=FLOAT} , #{item.exec_amount,jdbcType=FLOAT} )

mapper.select: select ma.req_code, hdd.dept_name, mid.inv_code, mid.inv_name, mid.inv_model, hu.unit_name, nvl(mrd.amount,0) amount, nvl(mrd.price,0) price, nvl(mrd.price,0) * nvl(mrd.amount,0) req_money from med_require_main ma join ( select mrr.req_id, mrr.copy_code , mrr.group_id , mrr.hos_id , mrr.inv_id from med_require_rela mrr left join med_require_main mrm on mrm.req_id = mrr.total_id and mrr.group_id = mrm.group_id and mrr.hos_id = mrm.hos_id and mrm.copy_code = mrr.copy_code where mrr.copy_code = #{copy_code} and mrr.group_id = #{group_id} and mrr.hos_id = #{hos_id} and mrr.total_id = #{req_id} ) mb on ma.req_id = mb.req_id and ma.copy_code = mb.copy_code and ma.group_id = mb.group_id and ma.hos_id = mb.hos_id left join hos_dept_dict hdd on hdd.dept_no = ma.dept_no and hdd.dept_id = ma.dept_id and hdd.group_id = ma.group_id and hdd.hos_id = ma.hos_id and hdd.is_stop = 0 left join med_require_detail mrd on mrd.copy_code = ma.copy_code and mrd.group_id = ma.group_id and mrd.hos_id = ma.hos_id and mrd.req_id = ma.req_id and mrd.inv_id = mb.inv_id left join med_inv_dict mid on mid.inv_no = mrd.inv_no and mid.inv_id = mrd.inv_id and mid.copy_code = mrd.copy_code and mid.hos_id = mrd.hos_id and mid.group_id = mrd.group_id and mid.is_stop = 0 left join hos_unit hu on hu.unit_code = mid.unit_code and hu.group_id = mid.group_id and hu.hos_id = mid.hos_id and hu.is_stop = 0
